tool_description: Generate a new token for Unlimited Language API. Token is only valid for ~5 minuts, so it has to be generated frequently
name: Token API
title: Token API

api_list.name: generate
api_list.description: Generate a new token for Language API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://token-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "token-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://token-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "token-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
